title: Two surveys on Web fonts (for vendors & Web designers)
content:
On the current topic of handling of fonts on the Web (via “@font-face” or .eot files), I have made a blog post and launched two related surveys (one of Web designers, one of font vendors).

The survey for font vendors is here:  
 [http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=I9LYBFmggGJ8SCTU0u3CtQ\_3d\_3d](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208063426/http:/www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=I9LYBFmggGJ8SCTU0u3CtQ_3d_3d "http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=I9LYBFmggGJ8SCTU0u3CtQ\_3d\_3d")

The survey for Web designers/producers is here:  
 [http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=wyFVRRqnxAmTypkzThJOkA\_3d\_3d](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208063426/http:/www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=wyFVRRqnxAmTypkzThJOkA_3d_3d "http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=wyFVRRqnxAmTypkzThJOkA\_3d\_3d")

My blog post is here:  
 [http://blogs.adobe.com/typblography/2007/11/web\_fonts\_1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208063426/http:/blogs.adobe.com/typblography/2007/11/web_fonts_1.html "http://blogs.adobe.com/typblography/2007/11/web\_fonts\_1.html")

Comments welcome, and I hope all the font licensors represented here take the survey, as well as the Web designers.

Cheers,

T

 [‹ Student expressive typography project. Any help appreciated](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208063426/http:/typophile.com/node/36783 "Go to previous forum topic") [KLIM's National joins the big leagues ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208063426/http:/typophile.com/node/38627 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Thomas Phinney
